import React, { Component } from 'react'; import back from './assets/back.png' import homecity from './assets/homecity.jpg' import villa from './assets/villa.jpg' import vince from './assets/vince.jpg' import bodega from './assets/bodega.jpg' import burn_alleycat from './assets/burn_alleycat.png' import fast_fridays from './assets/fast_fridays.png' import lost_pines from './assets/lost_pines.jpg' import the_farm from './assets/the_farm.jpg' import { Line } from 'rc-progress'; import Modal from './components/Modal' import imageList from './components/image_list' class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { modalOpen: false, modalImage: '' } this.handleModal = this.handleModal.bind(this) } handleModal(modalImage) { const { modalOpen } = this.state this.setState({modalOpen: modalOpen ? false : true, modalImage}) } render() { const { modalOpen, modalImage } = this.state return (
{ modalOpen ? : null }
